name: A Moving Block
description:
Hello this is my very first game.  To make and publish this game I used Brackeys tutorials, so credits to him and check him out on YouTube c:

You move with A&D, you use A to go to the left and D to move to the right, you move forward automatically. There are 5 levels, sometimes if you get stuck on a ledge you could get a bug then you just need to reload the game. 

If you have any feedback pls leave it in the comments, I would really appreciate that.  

Thanks for playing!
